  • qmat.qcoeff.butcher

qmat.qcoeff.butcher

Submodule to generate Q matrices based on Butcher tables

References

[1]

Wang, R., & Spiteri, R. J. (2007). Linear instability of the fifth-order WENO method. SIAM Journal on Numerical Analysis, 45(5), 1871-1901.

[2]

Alexander, R. (1977). Diagonally implicit Runge–Kutta methods for stiff ODE’s. SIAM Journal on Numerical Analysis, 14(6), 1006-1021.

[3]

Wanner, G., & Hairer, E. (1996). Solving ordinary differential equations II. Springer Berlin Heidelberg.

[4]

Butcher, J.C. (2003). Numerical methods for Ordianry Differential Equations. John Wiley & Sons.
